Draft Rating:

B

Steve Kerr ranks in the 70th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Kerr's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 3 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Alando Tucker with 29th pick but was worth 23th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Robin Lopez with 15th pick but was worth 47th pick.
  • Drafted Earl Clark with 14th pick but was worth 40th pick.

Trade Rating:

A-

Steve Kerr ranks in the 81th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Jared Dudley, Jason Richardson, Gani Lawal to PHO.
  • Lost Raja Bell, Boris Diaw, Sean Singletary to CHA.
Their biggest L:
  • Lost Rudy Fernández, James Jones to POR.

Signing Rating:

D+

Steve Kerr ranks in the 39th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Channing Frye in 2009.
  • Signed Grant Hill in 2007.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Lou Amundson in 2008.
  • Signed Brian Skinner in 2007.
  • Signed Stromile Swift in 2009.
